blogPost.excerpt: Choose a channel and let your mind wander with the continuous stream of videos we handpicked from the best YouTube creators. Relax with the natural images and sounds while you work, put on your TV or invite your friends to watch together.
blogPost.body: Choose a channel and let your mind wander with the continuous stream of videos we handpicked from the best YouTube creators. Relax with the natural images and sounds while you work, put on your TV or invite your friends to watch together.
blogPost.title: Escapista - Curated videos to relax and explore the world from home.
blogPost.author: Cristiano Dalbem

localize.description: 选择一个频道，让你的大脑随着我们从最优秀的YouTube创作者那里精选的源源不断的视频流而漫游。当您工作、打开电视或邀请您的朋友一起观看时，享受自然的图像和声音让您放松。
localize.tagline: 精心策划的视频，让您在家中放松并探索世界。

localize.description: 選擇一個頻道，讓你的大腦隨着我們從最優秀的YouTube創作者那裏精選的源源不斷的視頻流而漫遊。當您工作、打開電視或邀請您的朋友一起觀看時，享受自然的圖像和聲音讓您放鬆。
localize.tagline: 精心策劃的視頻，讓您在家中放鬆並探索世界。

previous.excerpt: We designed Yak Tack to help you boost your vocabulary in a matter of days. We use a simple, scientifically proven technique called spaced repetition to get people past the "Ebbinghaus Forgetting Curve" when learning new words.
previous.title: Yak Tack: Mobile App - Broaden your vocabulary. Simply.

localize.description: 我们设计的Yak Tack可以帮助你在几天内增加词汇量。我们使用一种简单的、经过科学验证的技术，称为间隔重复，让人们在学习新单词时越过“艾宾豪斯遗忘曲线”。
localize.tagline: 扩大你的词汇量。很简单。

localize.description: 我們設計的Yak Tack可以幫助你在幾天內增加詞彙量。我們使用一種簡單的、經過科學驗證的技術，稱爲間隔重複，讓人們在學習新單詞時越過“艾賓豪斯遺忘曲線”。
localize.tagline: 擴大你的詞彙量。很簡單。

next.excerpt: The SketchAR Mask Editor lets our users make custom AR lenses on Snapchat in minutes. Tap “Create AR Mask” on SketchAR. You can fill in a special template expressively or step by step. Then, tap “Try Lens”. Finally, transfer the mask to Snapchat.
next.title: SketchAR Masks for Snapchat - Create your own AR Mask for Snapchat in minutes

localize.description: SketchAR Mask Editor让我们的用户在几分钟内就可以在Snapchat上制作定制的AR镜头。点击SketchAR上的“Create AR Mask”(创建AR蒙版)。特殊模板可以表现式填写，也可以分步填写。然后，点击“试用镜头”。最后，将面具转移到Snapchat。
localize.tagline: 几分钟内即可为Snapchat创建您自己的AR掩码

localize.description: SketchAR Mask Editor讓我們的用戶在幾分鐘內就可以在Snapchat上製作定製的AR鏡頭。點擊SketchAR上的“Create AR Mask”(創建AR蒙版)。特殊模板可以表現式填寫，也可以分步填寫。然後，點擊“試用鏡頭”。最後，將面具轉移到Snapchat。
localize.tagline: 幾分鐘內即可爲Snapchat創建您自己的AR掩碼
